name: Night Catapult
description:
Made for the "WeeklyGameJam 172" with the theme "Catapult".

Destroy  all constructions. 

Get higest score!

Space - Shoot;

R - Reload

N - Next stage.

Music:

 Prepare For War, We Three Celtic Kings by Alexander Nakarada
